trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="choice" /> element (compositor) from the XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
trans-unit.target: Representa o elemento <see langword="choice" /> (compositor) do Esquema XML, conforme especificado pelo W3C (World Wide Web Consortium).

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="choice" /> allows only one of its children to appear in an instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="choice" /> permite que apenas um de seus filhos sejam exibidos em uma instância.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a `choice` element.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um `choice` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The following XML file is generated for the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: O seguinte arquivo XML é gerado para o exemplo de código anterior.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of the elements contained with the compositor (<see langword="choice" />): <see langword="XmlSchemaElement" />, <see langword="XmlSchemaGroupRef" />, <see langword="XmlSchemaChoice" />, <see langword="XmlSchemaSequence" />, or <see langword="XmlSchemaAny" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos contidos com o compositor (<see langword="choice" />): <see langword="XmlSchemaElement" />, <see langword="XmlSchemaGroupRef" />, <see langword="XmlSchemaChoice" />, <see langword="XmlSchemaSequence" /> ou <see langword="XmlSchemaAny" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of elements contained within <see langword="XmlSchemaChoice" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos contidos no <see langword="XmlSchemaChoice" />.
